_comment: Created by NCODowd on 16/11/2016 17:22:22 using v2.7
title: How have rates of community VTE changed?
analysis_commentary: Incidence of VTEs are higher in acute settings, with an average of 0.9% of all sampled patients having a VTE recorded in the time period, compared to 0.3% in a community setting. Incidence of VTEs in a community setting decreased from 0.5% of sampled patients in September 2012 and has been declining since.
data_source: NHS Digital, NHS Safety Thermometer
